bibl.title: Beloved and God. The Story of Hadrian and Antinous.
bibl.note: See: IX. Clouds hiding the sun. Egypt, August-October 130 (pp. 115-127); - X. Death in the Nile. October 130 (pp. 128-142); - XI. Life eternal, 130-31 (pp. 143-154); - XII. The secret of the tomb (pp. 155-160); - XVI. The rise and fall of Antinoopolis (pp. 198-208).
Lambert Royston, Beloved and God. The Story of Hadrian and Antinous.
London, Weidenfeld and Nicolson, 1984, 8Â°, xix-298 pp., 1 carte et 60 figg.
